Description: Adds specified amount of experience points. e.g.: addexp(25000)
Learns specified skill. e.g.: learnskill(sword_s3) Re-entering command will increase skill level.
Adds specified amount of skill points. e.g.: addskillpoints(5)
Changes Geralt's hairstyle to long loose hair
Changes Geralt's hairstyle to short with long bangs
Changes Geralt's hairstyle to mohawk with a pony tail
Changes Geralt's hairstyle to short with no bangs
